name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 13 Collector's Edition
name_original: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 13 Collector's Edition
description:
Help run Pinecreek Hills and New England’s Minuteman Valley

Help the famous Park Rangers run Pinecreek Hills and New England’s Minuteman Valley. Have fun organizing events on Bluewaters lake, Cherokee river and Apache trail in all 4 Seasons of the Year.

Learn about Wildlife. Camp & Picnic beside Rivers and Bayous. Explore atmospheric Waterfalls, Gorges, enchanted Caves and beautiful outdoor locations. Have fun on Hike & Bike Trails, go Paddleboarding, run a Pro Tour Fishing Tournament.

Take a flight to New England and see Amazing Foliage Colors in the Fall. Award Eagle Scout Medals, have Campfires & BBQ’s. Spot Bears, Deer and Eagles.

Play great Hogs & Puzzles, Spot 100’s of Animals, Birds, Fish and Wildlife. Protect the environment, get Souvenirs and Awards along the way.

Find objects in beautiful Hidden Object Scenes along with a wide range of puzzle games.
